channel.title: CVE Feed for Progress Software -- MOVEit Transfer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Progress Software -- MOVEit Transfer

item.title: CVE-2024-2291|2024-03-20T14:46:59.040Z -- Progress Software -- MOVEit Transfer
item.description: In Progress MOVEit Transfer versions released before 2022.0.11 (14.0.11), 2022.1.12 (14.1.12), 2023.0.9 (15.0.9), 2023.1.4 (15.1.4), a logging bypass vulnerability has been discovered.Â An authenticated user could manipulate a request to bypass the logging mechanism within the web application which results in user activity not being logged properly.
